item.title: China set to attend India's upcoming AI summit signaling improving relations with New Delhi
item.description: A Chinese science and technology vice minister will attend India's AI summit this month, a consultant told CNBC, citing government contacts.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves after hours: Palantir, NXP Semiconductors, DaVita and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in extended trading.

item.title: Strategy slides after bitcoin briefly dips below crypto firm's key breakeven level
item.description: Bitcoin fell as low as about $74,500 early Monday, dipping below Strategy's average purchase price of $76,052 per token.

item.title: Rare earth miners jump as Trump announces establishment of critical mineral reserve
item.description: Trump's move is aimed at cutting America's dependence on China for materials essential to electric vehicles, defense systems and advanced technology.

item.title: We just got reasons to love these 2 portfolio stocks even more
item.description: Goldman was tapped to advise a $58 billion merger. Mizuho says buy the Broadcom dip.
